text: Richard Enos Thompson, universally known as "Butch Thompson" (November 28, 1943 â€“ August 14, 2022) was an American jazz pianist and clarinetist. He was best known for his ragtime and stride works. From 1974 to 1986, he appeared on the radio show A Prairie Home Companion. From the 1960s until 2021, he led the Butch Thompson Trio. Thompson died on August 14, 2022 in Saint Paul, Minnesota at the age of 78. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2022 deaths Category:American jazz pianists Category:American clarinetists Category:Musicians from Minnesota
title: Butch Thompson
